collection_holder_name: Business & Media Archives of the Mahoning Valley
pageContext.collection_description:
Two 45 rpm records:
1. "Hang in there, Youngstown" by Stan Boney, copy write 1982 (Michael Pachelli), Arranged & Produced by Michael Pachelli, Recording Engineer: Gary Rhamy, Recorded at Peppermint Productions, 803 E. Indianola Ave., Youngstown, Oh 44502. Side 1, Time: 2:58, Sponsored by: WYTV, Stereo, PP1270A, Chitarra Music, BMI, 201076A. Side 2 (same as side one except for:) Time: 3:05, PP1270B, 201076B.
2. "For Kids For Fun, with Barney Bean and Sherwood, sing: ' Woe is me' - 'Spinach Song' - 'Little Rascal Song' - 'You Were Meant For Me' and loads of fun." Wam Records, Fun Series, !0 Ellenwood, Youngstown 7, Ohio, Side #1, 45 EP, RI 1440 A, Side #2, 45EP Ri 1440 B.
